title: Provides a $500,000 supplemental valuation impact grant to the West Valley central school district
summary: Provides a $500,000 supplemental valuation impact grant to the West Valley central school district.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1955

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 12, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. GIGLIO -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Real Property Taxation

       AN  ACT  to  amend the education law, in relation to providing a supple-
         mental valuation impact  grant  to  the  West  Valley  central  school
         district

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Paragraph a of subdivision 3 of section 3641 of the  educa-
    2  tion  law,  as amended by section 31 of part A of chapter 57 of the laws
    3  of 2009, is amended and a new paragraph e is added to read as follows:
    4    a. In addition to apportionments otherwise provided by  section  thir-
    5  ty-six  hundred two of this article, for aid payable in the two thousand
    6  eight--two thousand nine and two thousand nine--two thousand ten  school
    7  years,  the  amounts  specified  in  paragraphs c [and], d AND E of this
    8  subdivision shall be paid for the purpose of providing additional  fund-
    9  ing  for school districts which have experienced a significant financial
   10  hardship caused by an extraordinary change in the taxable property valu-
   11  ation, MORE THAN EIGHTY-THREE PERCENT OF THEIR REAL PROPERTY  CLASSIFIED
   12  AS  TAX EXEMPTION or extraordinary judgments resulting from tax certior-
   13  ari proceedings.
   14    E. TO THE WEST VALLEY CENTRAL SCHOOL DISTRICT,  THERE  SHALL  BE  PAID
   15  FIVE HUNDRED THOUSAND DOLLARS ($500,000). SUCH GRANT SHALL BE PAYABLE TO
   16  THE  WEST  VALLEY CENTRAL SCHOOL DISTRICT IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE PAYMENT
   17  SCHEDULES CONTAINED IN SECTION THIRTY-SIX HUNDRED NINE-A OF  THIS  ARTI-
   18  CLE, NOTWITHSTANDING ANY PROVISION OF LAW TO THE CONTRARY.
   19    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03727-01-1
